review: Love it! The only shortcoming is the difficulty with accessing web-only content. We ditched cable and love the Roku!
author: Reviewer

review: I have two ROKU Streaming sticks. They worked great and then I couldn't get past the Software update. I checked my Wi-Fi connection and it was connected but it still wouldn't go past the software update. I called support and was told it was out of warranty and would cost me $10 to get help. I have had a Blue Ray player for 2 years and have never had a problem. I won't ever buy another ROKU product.
author: N. Webb

review: Not good experience with this. I already had been using 2 older Roku boxes with no troubles. I bought this one and it was horrible. Constantly overheated, crashed and was not streaming correctly-constantly getting buffering messages. Maybe i had a bad one, but I don't think so. I think it's small design makes for overheating, and then it just doesn't work, even after repeated resetting. Will return it.

review: Streaming stick works great but the remote stops working every time I use it- It will turn it on, and that's about it. Have replaced the batteries and reprogrammed it, but still the remote continues to fail. Only reason I give it 3 stars is because I downloaded the Roku Remote app on my smartphone and it works perfectly- shame I have to provide my the remote.
